Now that I have everything functional with my RPC DecideRule, I have
run in=
to a new problem.  Heritrix appears to be making so many
connections in suc=
h a short amount of time, that my server is getting
overwhelmed and returni=
ng http(500) for about 10% of the connections.  

I am looking for enlighte=
nment on how the processors work.  Do they
run in a single thread, or are t=
he multi-threaded, with factories
creating processes as needed for each Cra=
wlURI?  What I'm seeing makes
me think my DecideRule (implemented in the Ex=
tractHTML Module) is
having multi instances created, and each instance is t=
hus trying to
make a separate HTTP/RPC call.

Any pointers at all into the =
internal arch of the DecideRules would be
